formattedAddress: 131 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 131 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10026-2141, USA

originalText.text:
My son did 3k and prek at this school.
The teachers are wonderful and my son learned a lot there. It was a good transition from daycare to high school. Ms. Davis was for us a loving and caring person.She was all the time there to help us when ever we need.
We thanks her and the staff.
They have the own kitchen with the most friendly women who cook everyday for the children and a playground with a lot of staff to play.My son miss his school and friends and can not wait to come back to say HI! ‚ù§üôè

originalText.text: My aunt, myself and now my children have all gone here! I love this school and staff so much. I think this school is such a great introduction for starting in school as a full time student.  I love that they are just the right amount of everything here and not so strict. This staff knows how to take care of our babies! THANK YOU THANK YOU..

originalText.text:
Our son has been attending daycare at Citizen‚Äôs Care Day Care for the last year, and will be attending next year as well. This is a loving daycare, where students learn the moral and intellectual lessons that are fit for their age. It‚Äôs also very affordable.

We‚Äôve been very happy with the education ‚Äî our son learned his ABC‚Äôs and to count to twenty before he turned 3! But he‚Äôs also learned a great deal as a friend. His teachers, Ms. Barry, Ms. Sissoko and Ms. Kerwood, have all been excellent. They keep the classroom beautifully decorated and are always doing some fun activity like puzzles or songs. Every day they go outside to play in the playground. This is not a place where they just drop the kids in front of the TV! The other students are great, from a wide variety of different backgrounds. Our son loves his teachers and his friends.

My only complaint is not anything that the school can effect. The front door is hard to find, and shrouded under extensive scaffolding.

Overall, a wonderful school for young children. We feel so fortunate to have gotten in when we did.
